remarks: Cyclically shifting a closed walk as word results in a closed walk as word (in an undirected graph).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jun-2018.)
statement: clwwisshclwwn $p |- ( ( W e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ N e. ( 0 ... ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( W cyclShift N ) e. ( V ClWWalks E ) ) $.
